titles.title: Gädlä Täklä Haymanot “Vita of Täklä Haymanot” / Mälkǝʾa Täklä Haymanot “Image of Täklä Haymanot” / Täʾamrä Täklä Haymanot “Miracles of Täklä Haymanot”

shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Gädlä Täklä Haymanot “Vita of Täklä Haymanot” (fols. 4ra-130ra) II) Mälkǝʾa Täklä Haymanot “Image of Täklä Haymanot” (fols. 130rb-132va) III) Täʾamrä Täklä Haymanot “Miracles of Täklä Haymanot”: 2 miracles (132va-134rb)
Additiones 1-2.

copyists.copyist: Wäldä Giyorgis is mentioned as the scribe in Additio 1.

donors.donor: The Ms. was commissioned by Dämä Krәstos (s. Additio 1).

owners.owner: Additio 1 mentions the name of the church as Dägälät Mikaʾel.

dcomments.dcomment: 18th cent. (?) Dämä Krǝstos might be a ruler of Wag and Lasta, a contemporary of King Bäkaffa (r. 1721-30) and King ʾIyasu II (r. 1730-55).

txstates.txstate: The front and back boards are broken and repaired. The quires are loose, the original sewing is missing, crudely repaired with various threads. Mold is visible on some fols. (e.g. fols. 2, 11, 12). Some fols. are damaged by water (esp. fols. 131-137). Tears carefully amended on fols. 55, 60, 65. Fols. 69-70 are of smaller size.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards (both boards are broken and repaired). Two pairs of sewing stations.

bnothers.bnother: Small holes are visible in the centre fold of the quires, one close to the head and one close to the tail of the codex.

squires.squire:
A(3; s.l.: 2, stub after 1/fols. 1r-3v) – ፩I(7; s.l.: 5, stub after 2/fols. 4r-10v) – ፪II(7; s.l.: 5, stub after 2/fols. 11r-17v) – ፫III(8/fols. 18r-25v) – IV(8; s.l.: 4, stub after 5; 5, stub after 4/fols. 26r-33v) – V(9; s.l.: 4, stub after 4/fols. 34r-42v) – VI(8/fols. 43r-50v) – ፯VII(8/fols. 51r-58v) – ፰VIII(8/fols. 59r-66v) – IX(6/fols. 67r-72v) – ፲X(8/fols. 73r-80v) – ፲፩XI(8+2/fols. 81r-90v) – ፲፪XII(8/fols. 91r-98v) – ፲፫XIII(8/fols. 99r-106v) – ፲፬XIV(8/fols. 107r-114v) – ፲፭XV(8/fols. 115r-122v) – ፲፮XVI(8/fols. 123r-130v) – XVII(5; s.l.: 3, stub after 2/fols. 131r-135v) – B(2/fols. 136r-137v)
Fols. 83-84 is an eccentric insertion.

taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are partly visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

pchangeofhands.pchangeofhand: The handwriting is upright to slightly left-sloping.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; name of the protagonist; name of the scribe; name of the donor; incipit of Text I and of its subsections; incipit of subsections of Text III; elements of the punctuation signs; elements of Ethiopic numerals. On the incipit page of Text I (fol. 4r), few lines are rubricated, alternating with black lines.

otherdetails.otherdetail: - Text I belongs to the so-called "Ḥayq recension" of Gädlä Täklä Haymanot. Cp. Mss. BN Éth. 342 (GrébGriaule II, 18-20), Ṭānāsee 162 (SixTana III, 202-06), BN Éth. 697 (uncatalogued, see C. CONTI-ROSSINI, 1910, “I principali studi pubblicati in occasione della missione Duchesne-Fournet in Abissinia (manoscritti etiopici e ricerche antropologiche)”, Bolletino della Societa Geografica Italiana ser. 4, 11: 1060-1071.). For a French translation of the text s. J. DUCHESNE-FOURNET, Mission en Éthiopie, 1901-1903, vol. 1, Paris 1908, 340-431. - Text I included the embedded colophon of the Vita: [Fol. 129rb, l.16] ወይእዚኒ፡ ንነግረክሙ፡ ዘተከሥተ፡ መ [fol. 129va] ጽሐፈ፡ ገድሉ፡ ለክቡር፡ ብእሲ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ አቡነ፡ ተክለ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ በ፪፻ወ፯ዓመተ፡ ወ፱አውራኃ፡ ተከሥተ፡ ዝንቱ፡ መጽሐፍ፡ በ፯ትውልድ፡ በከመ፡ እምአዳም፡ እስከ፡ ወልደ፡ ያሬድ፡ ወአርአዮ፡ ሄኖክ፡ ፊደለ፡ በጸፍጸፈ፡ ሰማይ፡ ዘይብል፡ አልፋ፡ ወኦ[ሜጋ]፡ የውጣ፡ ወቤጣ፡ ወበከመ፡ ከሠተ፡ ሎቱ፡ በ፯ትውልድ፡ እምነ፡ ተክለ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ እስከ፡ እስከ፡[sic] ዮሓንስ፡ ከመ፡[sic] (…) [fol. 129vb, l.17] ዛቲ፡ መጽሐፍ፡ በ፸ወ፯ [fol. 130ra] ዓመተ፡ ምሕረት፡ በመንግሥተ፡ ገብረ፡ መስቀል፡ መፍቀሬ፡ እግዚአብሔር።

additional.det: The note is written in the main hand; it states that the Ms. was written for the the church of Dägälät Mikaʾel by the scribe Wäldä Giyorgis, commissioned by Dämä Krәstos.
Crudely written in a secondary hand. Spaces for rubrication are left empty.

extras.extra: - Spaces for rubrication in Text II are left empty. - Doodles: fols. 1r, 1v, 2r.

txquiremarks.txquiremark: - Quire marks are written on the left upper corner of the first folio of the quires: ፩: fol. 4r; ፪: fol. 11r; ፫: fol. 18r; ፯: fol. 51r; ፰: fol. 59r; ፲: fol. 73r; ፲፩: fol. 81r; ፲፪: fol. 91r; ፲፫: fol. 99r; ፲፬: fol. 107r; ፲፭: fol. 115r; ፲፮: fol. 123r.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - Monthly readings are indicated by the dates written in the upper margin: ፳ወ፬ለመስከረም፡ ምንባብ፡: fol. 13rb ፳ወ፬ለጥቅምት፡ ምንባብ: fol. 22vb ፳ወ፬ለኅዳር፡ ምንባብ፡: fol. 34vb ፳ወ፬ለታኅሣሥ፡ ምንባብ: fol. 47ra ፳ወ፬ለጥር፡ ምንባብ፡: fol. 56ra ፳ወ፬ለየካቲት፡ ምንባብ።: fol. 68ra ፳ወ፬ለመጋቢት፡ ምንባብ፡: fol. 76va ፳ወ፬ለሚያዝያ፡ ምንባብ።: fol. 85rb ፳ወ፬ለግንቦት፡ ምንባብ፡: fol. 92ra ፳ወ፬ለሰኔ፡ ምንባብ፡: fol. 100vb ፳ወ፬ለሐምሌ፡ ምንባብ፡: fol. 110ra ፳ወ፬ለነሐሴ፡ ምንባብ፡: fol. 122va.

frames.frame: - Fol. 130rb (incipit page of Text II): crude ornamental band, geometric motifs.
